sample_docs: any authentication , any channel! make login easier and more secure for mobile, web, IoT Any channel, any device – we've got you covered. Choose from our suite of user-friendly authentication solutions, from 2FA to passwordless biometrics, to find the right authentication for your business and users. 2019 State of Customer Authentication Survey Report released Find out how top industry professionals are using/planning to use strong authentication technologies. Lighten up login Making login a better experience is a win-win for everyone. Users are happier and more productive. Businesses improve their bottom line by streamlining access to services and apps while also improving security. One-stop strong authentication shop We're the only authentication partner you'll ever need. Start with 2FA and progress to more advanced technology like biometrics-based authentication to continue improving user experience and security over time. Our SaaS-based authentication service, REST APIs , mobile SDKs and UI widgets deliver a powerful combination of software components that can be used to build omni-channel authentication experiences that span mobile, web, phone, IoT, chatbots, kiosks, physical access and more. FIDO Biometrics Passwordless UX Enterprise MFA Mobile Push 2FA passcodes FIDO Biometrics Passwordless UX Enterprise MFA Mobile Push 2FA passcodes Authentication solutions for every use case No matter your business challenge, we have an authentication solution for it. Web apps Boost security of user credentials for login to any web app by layering on 2FA for a safer but still seamless authentication experience. Mobile apps Increase app usage and engagement with fast, convenient biometrics already on users' phones — including keeping users logged in while protecting personal data. Enterprise apps Streamline single-sign-on (SSO) and strengthen security by leveraging biometrics on mobile phones to authenticate user access to web and desktop apps. Kiosk or ATM access Simplify the customer experience at kiosks or ATMs by providing a more secure biometric alternative to theft-prone PINs and ATM cards. Slide 1 of 4 Web apps Boost security of user credentials for login to any web app by layering on 2FA for a safer but still seamless authentication experience. Mobile apps Increase app usage and engagement with fast, convenient biometrics already on users' phones — including keeping users logged in while protecting personal data. Enterprise apps Streamline single-sign-on (SSO) and strengthen security by leveraging biometrics on mobile phones to authenticate user access to web and desktop apps. Kiosk or ATM access Simplify the customer experience at kiosks or ATMs by providing a more secure biometric alternative to theft-prone PINs and ATM cards. Why ThumbSignIn The most authentication options to work with your current situation – we meet you where you are Seamless omnichannel authentication and privileged access across channels and devices Secure PKI-based infrastructure to protect against phishing, man-in-the-middle and replay attacks Future-proofed authentication provides the most current security protocols and easy-to-upgrade platform In the news MEDIA This is the future of authentication, according to security experts As we've increasingly adopted a wide range of personal gadgets and online services, passwords have become a pain to manage, and a point of vulnerability. Aman Khanna, ThumbSignIn's VP of Products, describes how the industry is likely to move to multi-mode biometrics which is hundreds of times more reliable than using a single factor. Read more BYLINE The future of biometric authentication lies beyond mobile apps Once the domain of high government officials or James Bond Flicks, biometric identification is now commonplace to most anyone who owns a recent smartphone. Vivek Lakshman, ThumbSignIn's VP of Innovation, explains that biometrics can go beyond mobile apps to new frontiers including IoT devices, kiosks, atms and more. Read more MEDIA Why Is the US Losing the AI Race? Why is the US, once an assumed leader in artificial intelligence, losing its foothold on the technology? And how can it get its position back? Aman Khanna, ThumbSignIn's VP of Products, shares insight into how hackers are using AI to generate phishing attacks and how the US can defend itself. Partner with us We make it easy for a variety of partners to work with us. We offer flexible pricing, attractive partner incentive structures and highly responsive customer service and support. Partner with us We make it easy for a variety of partners to work with us. We offer flexible pricing, attractive partner incentive structures and highly responsive customer service and support. Our partnership programs Managed services providers IAM platform providers Technology partners Managed services providers Offer your customers the most effective and user-friendly passwordless authentication solution by incorporating ThumbSignIn into your portfolio. Boost revenue Offer ThumbSignIn as a part of your data privacy/GDPR and security standards offerings for biometrics and PKI-based strong authentication. Offer FIDO standards With FIDO becoming the de facto Internet standard for strong authentication, more customers will be looking for FIDO certification for better security and interoperability with a wide ecosystem of authentication solutions and security products. Easily integrate Compatibility with SAML and OpenID Connect simplifies integration with customers' existing and future enterprise apps and technology stacks. Additionally, comprehensive and easy-to-consume APIs make custom integration a breeze. Slide 1 of 3 Boost revenue Offer ThumbSignIn as a part of your data privacy/GDPR and security standards offerings for biometrics and PKI-based strong authentication. Offer FIDO standards With FIDO becoming the de facto Internet standard for strong authentication, more customers will be looking for FIDO certification for better security and interoperability with a wide ecosystem of authentication solutions and security products. Easily integrate Compatibility with SAML and OpenID Connect simplifies integration with customers' existing and future enterprise apps and technology stacks. Additionally, comprehensive and easy-to-consume APIs make custom integration a breeze. Identity and access management (IAM) platform providers Chances are your customers are already asking about FIDO-compliant strong authentication. Stay ahead of the competition by bringing ThumbSignIn to your IAM platform to enhance your existing security suite. Go to market faster Save your time and money — don't build biometrics from scratch. We're invested in keeping on top of continuously evolving FIDO standards and new mobile devices so that you don't have to be. Future proof FIDO standards ensure the strongest user authentication security protocols, including public key infrastructure (PKI), elimination of server-side shared secrets, and on-device-only storage of biometrics. Expand your market Target new customers in highly regulated industries that are looking for strong authentication and biometric solutions. Products Make authentication easier and stronger – your way Who knows your business, users, and systems better than you? We help you implement the right authentication solutions for mobile, web and IoT to provide a more streamlined experience for users and help you step up your security game. Products Make authentication easier and stronger – your way Who knows your business, users, and systems better than you? We help you implement the right authentication solutions for mobile, web and IoT to provide a more streamlined experience for users and help you step up your security game. The right authentication technology for today and into the future Choose from a variety of technologies to meet your current authentication needs as well as support your ongoing evolution. BIOMETRICS 2 FACTOR AUTH PASSWORDS Biometrics Biometric authentication, like a fingerprint or facial scan, is not only more secure, but also much more convenient for users, allowing them to faster and avoid remembering passwords. FIDO Biometrics Eliminates passwords or passcodes or additional steps. Quickly authenticates with more secure fingerprint scans, facial recognition or other biometrics on users' mobile devices. Mobile and server software certified to the FIDO standards by the FIDO Alliance. Biometric UX Lite Securely stores user credentials such as passwords in the mobile keychain and enables unlocking with more secure biometric fingerprint or facial recognition to keep app users logged in and make authentication a breeze for mobile apps. Client only component with simplified SDK for easy integration with mobile apps. Slide 1 of 2 FIDO Biometrics Eliminates passwords or passcodes or additional steps. Quickly authenticates with more secure fingerprint scans, facial recognition or other biometrics on users' mobile devices. Mobile and server software certified to the FIDO standards by the FIDO Alliance. Biometric UX Lite Securely stores user credentials such as passwords in the mobile keychain and enables unlocking with more secure biometric fingerprint or facial recognition to keep app users logged in and make authentication a breeze for mobile apps. Client only component with simplified SDK for easy integration with mobile apps. Two-factor authentication (2FA) A suite of two-factor authentication options provides more secure identity verification for all users on any channel or device. 2FA Mobile Push Sends notifications to users via mobile app to prompt them to authorize login or access permissions at a touch of a button. 2FA TOTP (Time-based One-time Passcodes) Generates a temporary second factor password on a users' device to unlock access as part of a secure two-factor authentication process. Runs entirely on a mobile device and does not need an internet connection. 2FA SMS Supports users without smartphones or internet access by sending one-time passcodes (OTPs) via text messages that can be typed in for two-factor authentication. Easy to drive usage as no mobile app is needed. 2FA Voice Authenticates users without smartphones or internet access by sending one-time passcodes (OTPs) via automated phone calls. Easy to drive usage as no mobile app is needed. Slide 1 of 4 2FA Mobile Push Sends notifications to users via mobile app to prompt them to authorize login or access permissions at a touch of a button. 2FA TOTP (Time-based One-time Passcodes) Generates a temporary second factor password on a users' device to unlock access as part of a secure two-factor authentication process. Runs entirely on a mobile device and does not need an internet connection. 2FA SMS Supports users without smartphones or internet access by sending one-time passcodes (OTPs) via text messages that can be typed in for two-factor authentication. Easy to drive usage as no mobile app is needed. 2FA Voice Authenticates users without smartphones or internet access by sending one-time passcodes (OTPs) via automated phone calls. Easy to drive usage as no mobile app is needed. Solutions for every use case Browse our solutions pages to see how our authentication technologies can be applied to meet your business challenges, or contact us for more information.
